Bash("C:\\Program Files\\Python312\\python.exe" -c "
import sys
sys.path.insert\(0, ''c:/Users/ved/Documents/sachengg/dfm_python''\)
from rules.dfm_rules import DFMRuleEngine, PROCESSES

# Test with fresh engine \(cnc\)
e = DFMRuleEngine\(''cnc''\)
print\(''=== CNC Process ===''\)
print\(''Process name:'', e.get_process_name\(\)\)
print\(''min_hole_diameter:'', e.rules.get\(''min_hole_diameter''\)\)
print\(''min_wall_thickness:'', e.rules.get\(''min_wall_thickness''\)\)

# Switch to molding
e.set_process\(''molding''\)
print\(\)
print\(''=== Injection Molding ===''\)
print\(''Process name:'', e.get_process_name\(\)\)
print\(''min_hole_diameter:'', e.rules.get\(''min_hole_diameter''\)\)
print\(''min_wall_thickness:'', e.rules.get\(''min_wall_thickness''\)\)
print\(''max_wall_thickness:'', e.rules.get\(''max_wall_thickness''\)\)

# Switch to 3dprint
e.set_process\(''3dprint''\)
print\(\)
print\(''=== 3D Printing ===''\)
print\(''Process name:'', e.get_process_name\(\)\)
print\(''min_wall_thickness:'', e.rules.get\(''min_wall_thickness''\)\)
print\(''max_overhang_angle:'', e.rules.get\(''max_overhang_angle''\)\)
")
